title: I'm in class twelve I want to clear NEET and what are the books I need to use but I can't afford so many books? - Quora

response.answer_text: Only NCERT for biology because upto 70_80% are asked from NCERT directly… For physics you have to touch with NCERT plus one reference book Arihant is the best for physics …. For organic chemistry NCERT must but for inorganic you have to preapare from other book like MTG and error less nd op Tandon.. Thanks
